comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*
He can’t hear you over the sound of his yacht.

This is what happens when you give little people a lot of power. He, and Sinema, are enjoying how much news coverage, courting by Repubs, and lobbyist money they are receiving while they completely fuck every American.

I don't think that SinMan has the authority to order anything out or in the pending bills. It has to be a request up the Biden's administration chain of command to surrender by consent or confronting the Senators by letting the chips fall where they may. It will be interesting to know who gave the go-ahead to allow SinMan to act as President and to grant a win for corporate power and corruption.

I swear to God by the time Manchin and Sinema are done cutting this bill down it will just be a personal check to each of them. In fact, could we try that? Just throw some pork in the bill just for Arizona and West Virginia since money is all they seem to respond to

Funny part is I’ve worked at some companies where paid newborn leave is the norm. What Manchin is saying is for everyday people, since you are not valued sucks for you. then you shouldn’t be the maid cleaning his house boat…oops I mean yacht.
There are two problem senators, they need to be primaried, and we need to get more senators so this can't happen again.
Despite people suffering through a global pandemic. Whatta dick. Don’t worry, all hai rich buddies got richer.
Is this asshole the only Senator in the place who can’t be blackmailed? Can’t Biden take him out for a round of golf like Trump did to Graham?
Just cross state lines, bypass him, and talk directly to his people. It pisses him off because it airs his corrupt dirty laundry. Ffs

Its time for progressives to walk Manchin has been dishonest and keeps moving further and further right and according to multiple reports threatened to leave the Democratic party and caucus with Republicans if he does not get his way. There is no negotiating with him it just gives him power walk away and make sure every voter in Virginia understands why there is no free 2 years college, parental leave expanded Medicaid.
A great Patriot. C'mon Manchie don't let them haters get to you. You're still my old man Jesus.

We need to come out hard in 2022, so that he and Sinema can become irrelevant again.

The alternative is disaster.

Maybe Manchin is trying to highlight the vulnerability in our government to being hijacked by a single person so that this vulnerability can be seen and fixed?


Or I guess he could just be an asshole...
One senator should never be able to have this much sway.
